item.title:
Doja Cat calls her albums ‘Hot Pink’ and ‘Planet Her’ “cash-grabs” in new tweet:
“planet her and hot pink were cash-grabs and yall fell for it. now i can go disappear somewhere and touch grass with my loved ones on an island while yall weep for mediocre pop.”
item.author: popcrave

item.title: Doja Cat’s fourth studio album is called ‘First of All’.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
“Heaven” by Niall Horan has reached 100 MILLION streams on Spotify.
It’s his 13th song to achieve this.
item.author: popcrave
popcrave

item.title:
Santos is expected to appear at federal court in New York as soon as Wednesday, where the criminal charges have been filed under seal.
